Poetic Translation: I still regret a thousand times my flight;
I left behind your loving disposition.

Lyrics: Jay si grand dueil et paine douloureuse,
Direct Translation: See translation at the Choral Public Domain Library.
Poetic Translation: Great is my grief and sorrowful contrition,

Lyrics: Quon me verra brief mes jours definer.
Poetic Translation: And soon my days will fade into the night.
